content.raw: It might be a good idea if documentation were in some source format like sphinx, such that people could make pull requests that include diffable/mergable changes to documentation. Requesting that someone update the docs to include the details of their change probably ought to be part of our pull request routine. I have a few small projects that are documented with sphinx on readthedocs, and the docs there get automatically updated whenever I push the code. It's pretty slick.
